title: Mulled wine
summary: Mulled wine, also known as spiced wine, is a beverage usually made with red wine along with various mulling spices and sometimes raisins, served hot or warm.[1] It is alcoholic, although there are non-alcoholic versions of it. It is a traditional drink during winter, especially around Christmas.[2] It is served at Christmas markets in  Europe. However, Vodka-Spiked Mulled Wine can be found on Polish Chrismas Markets, where mulled wine is being used as a mixer.
